name: rdnordic-website
description: R&D Nordic consulting website - static HTML/CSS site with self-hosted dependencies

scripts.validate: python -c "import pathlib; print('Validating HTML files...'); [print(str(p)) for p in pathlib.Path('.').rglob('*.html') if p.is_file() and '.git' not in p.parts and 'node_modules' not in p.parts]"

author: R&D Nordic
